lead_paragraph: Robby Ginepri opened the defense of his title at the RCA Championships in Indianapolis yesterday with a 4-6 7-5 7-5 victory over Alejandro Falla. Ginepri, seeded fourth, double-faulted on match point before serving out the victory.
snippet: Robby Ginepri opened the defense of his title at the RCA Championships in Indianapolis yesterday with a 4-6 7-5 7-5 victory over Alejandro Falla. Ginepri, seeded fourth, double-faulted on match point before serving out the victory.
